title: To Rescue General Gordon
description: Their superiors call it insubordination. Henry and James like to think of it as following orders...creatively.So when the two young officers in Her Majesty's Royal Air Navy, along with their hulking Sikh friend Raheem, decide to rescue the famous General Gordon, trapped in a city under siege by an army of religious fanatics, their methods aren't exactly "cricket."The resulting adventure could bring them glory and fame, or doom them to a painful death at the hands of savage tribesmen.That is, if their own commanders don't get to them first!To Rescue General Gordon is an 8,000 word (35 pages) steampunk novelette.
author: J.P. Medved
